title: France panorama. [No. 69/51]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Winter traditions: St Nicholas in Colmar. Enthronement in Touraine. 2. Today and yesterday - the Paris airport. 3. Key techniques - lasers. 4. The French Vocation Foundation - 1969 prizes and exhibition. 5. The arts: The Apollinaire Exhibition. The Chagall Exhibition.
